creator: eseidel@apple.com
text:
We had a user report that the word "website" is misspelled (mistyped?) in the korean version of the 
default index.

I don't speak korean, so I can't confirm this.  But I felt it best to pass this along to you all.

Note from user:
Pls refer to enclosed file named in Apache.zip. You can decompress it. You will find 
Mod_index.xxxx file. Which is modified file. And index.xxx is original file.

I've also attached their screen-shot noting the error.

If you could have someone who speaks Korean at your end verify?

Sorry I'm not much more help... 

-eric

creator: eseidel@apple.com
text:
Created attachment 7986
this is the user's proposed correction.  Inludes both corrected and original.

creator: eseidel@apple.com
text:
Created attachment 7987
This is the image the user submitted showing the typo.

I'm going through the bug db to make sure patches are findable.  Please see 
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/patches.html
creator: trawick@apache.org
trawick@apache.org
text:
whoops, as somebody pointed out recently on another PR, if we are to consider
such a submission, the originator must submit it to us, not some 3rd party
